Question: Democratic leaders, including Chuck Schumer, took the opportunity to attack this person's motives for the budget standoff.
Hints: On February 7, 2012, this person came in last place in the Minnesota Republican caucuses with about 10.7% of the vote.
This person has also been an advocate for health information technology.
However, this person sold his home in Carrollton and moved to Marietta in the new 6th.
